descript.abstract: New York City Motor Vehicle Collisions, 2024 is a point theme representing the location of motor vehicle collisions in the year 2024 as reported by the New York City Police Department. Attributes include the date and time of the accidents, the number of people killed or injured, the type of vehicle(s) involved in the collision, and other factors that were involved in the collision. This dataset was derived from NYC OpenData (https://data.cityofnewyork.us/Public-Safety/NYPD-Motor-Vehicle-Collisions/h9gi-nx95) in August 2025. Columbia Libraries staff extracted the year's records and converted them to geopackage format by state plane x/y coordinates. Some records lack geolocation information, and they have coordinates 0,0. Columbia Libraries staff has provided the data in the geopackage format, and a codebook and a has been included in the download package. A codebook has been included in the download package.
